channel.title: DWARFS Research Group on
channel.description: Recent content in DWARFS Research Group on

item.title: Olá!
item.description: I am a PhD student at the Observatório do Valongo/UFRJ, a member of the Extragalactic Astronomy Laboratory, and part of the WALLABY collaboration. My current research focuses on dwarf galaxies in cosmic voids, studying their gas properties and chemical evolution. I have experience in mid-infrared spectroscopy and astrochemistry applied to the search for evidence of black holes in nearby and distant galaxies.
